title: 7 Books That Explain Why Russia Wants Ukraine
sub_head: Going behind the headlines with books on the conflict and the region, as reviewed in The Wall Street Journal.
body:
With the threat of a Russian invasion of Ukraine dominating the headlines, weâ€™ve collected a short list of books that provide historical context for the situation today, as discussed by reviewers in the pages of The Wall Street Journal.
By Anne Applebaum| Doubleday
